mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.rx_name AS "rxName", a.rx_no AS "rxNo", a.pay_type AS "payType", '自费' AS payTypeName, a.patient_id AS "patientId", a.patient_name AS "patientName", if(a.patient_gender='1','男','女') AS "patientGender", a.patient_age AS "patientAge", a.patient_address AS "patientAddress", a.patient_phone AS "patientPhone", a.case_no AS "caseNo", a.category AS "category", a.clinical_diagnosis AS "clinicalDiagnosis", a.doctor AS "doctor", a.approval_doctor AS "approvalDoctor", a.deploy_doctor AS "deployDoctor", a.check_doctor AS "checkDoctor", a.total_amount AS "totalAmount", a.status AS "status", (SELECT label from sys_dict where value = a.status and type = 'rx_status' limit 1) as statusName, a.department_id AS "departmentId", (SELECT name from sys_office where id = a.department_id limit 1) as departmentName, a.create_date AS "createDate", a.rx_date AS "rxDate", a.process_date AS "processDate", a.process_user AS "processUser", a.delete_mark AS "deleteMark", a.remark AS "remark", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.mender AS "mender", a.creator AS "creator"
